author: cagatay
msg: Fixed TOMAHAWK-803 and other validation issues. Component was omitting the default validation behavior in UIInput and UISelectOne
so it was ignoring required attribute and it's other validators. Removed overriden validation since it's already implemented in UISelectOne.
